Combat
Hit Points: 58 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity (1 max); untrained) Class DC: Bard: 21 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+8 1d6+2 B R20'; dexterity; trained); Lance (+9 1d8+2 P [Crit +d8]; strength; trained); Shield Boss (+9 1d6+2 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Pick)
Blessed Denial: (R) R30' Reduces by 1 the severity of the triggering frightened, drained, enfeebled, sickened, or stupefied effect on an ally
Martial Performance: Successful Strike while Courageous Anthem, Rallying Anthem, or Song Of Strength is active extends the spell by 1 rd
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Divine: +11 (charisma; trained); Occult: +11 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine: 21 (charisma; trained); Occult: 21 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Fear (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Lay On Hands (D1 Foc): (1) Touched regains 6 HP and, if the target is not self, gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; touched undead instead suffers 1d6 HP vitality and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude also negates -2 Armor Class) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Protector's Sacrifice (D1 Foc): (R) R30' Transfers 3 HP damage of the triggering attack from target to self (heightened +1 transfers +3 HP)
Magic Notes:
Blessed One Dedication: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Lay On Hands divine spell/Has a focus pool
Blessed Sacrifice: Knows the Protector's Sacrifice divine spell
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Greater Mercy: Has increased Mercy effects
Warrior: Knows the Fear occult spell
Affliction Mercy: 2-action Lay On Hands can attempt to counteract an affliction such as a curse, disease, or poison
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Blessed Spell: (1) Subsequent targeted spell cast on an ally has Mercy effects once per 10 min
Mercy (Body): 2-action Lay On Hands can also attempt to counteract drained, slowed, blinded, dazzled, deafened, enfeebled, or sickened
Rejuvenating Touch: Lay On Hands gives 10 temporary Hit Points, lasting 1 rd, each rd for 10 rd
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Ultimate Mercy: 2-action Lay On Hands can restore life with 1 Hit Point and wounded 1 to a target who died in the previous rd
Notes
Validation Errors:
Affliction Mercy Feat: Requires mercy feature (currently 1) and champion level >= 12 or blessed one dedication level (currently 5) >= 14
Blessed Denial Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12 and blessed one dedication feature (currently 1)
Blessed Spell Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8, blessed one dedication feature (currently 1), max spell level (currently 3) and mercy feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 2 available vs. 9 allocated
Greater Mercy Feat: Requires mercy feature (currently 1) and champion level >= 8, champion dedication level >= 16 or blessed one dedication level (currently 5) >= 10
Mercy (Body) Feat: Requires lay on hands (d1 foc) spell (currently 1) and champion level >= 4, champion dedication level >= 8 or blessed one dedication level (currently 5) >= 6
Rejuvenating Touch Feat: Requires lay on hands (d1 foc) spell (currently 1) and champion level >= 18 or blessed one dedication level (currently 5) >= 20
Ultimate Mercy Feat: Requires mercy feature (currently 1) and champion level >= 18 or blessed one dedication level (currently 5) >= 20
